settings.heading: About this Brand
settings.text: Landlords Paint Provides elegance with practicality, providing custom-tailored solutions that not only beautify but also add value to your property. With a focus on eco-sustainability, Landlords Paint prioritising the environmentally conscious choice for property owners with a vision.

settings.title: Odourless
settings.text: Formulated to be odourless, ensuring a pleasant painting experience without unpleasant fumes.

settings.title: Great Adhesion
settings.text: Provides excellent adhesion to the surface, ensuring the primer effectively seals and prepares the walls for painting.

settings.title: Eco-friendly
settings.text: Made with eco-friendly ingredients, offering a sustainable option for environmentally-conscious users.

settings.title: Transparent
settings.text: Once dry, the primer leaves a transparent surface, allowing the true colour of the paint to shine through.

settings.title: Great Coverage
settings.text: Offers impressive coverage, allowing you to cover a larger area with less product, saving time and effort.

settings.title: Eliminates Odours
settings.text: The odourless formula ensures a comfortable painting environment, making it suitable for use in enclosed spaces.

settings.title: Enhanced Adhesion
settings.text: Achieve optimal paint adhesion with the primer's superior bonding properties, resulting in a smooth and long-lasting finish.

settings.title: Environmental Responsibility
settings.text: Choose a primer that aligns with your eco-conscious values, as it's crafted with eco-friendly components.

settings.title: Clear Surface
settings.text: Enjoy a clear and transparent surface after application, providing a clean canvas for your desired paint colour.

settings.heading: Additives
settings.text: Our paints are powered by cutting-edge additives, carefully engineered to enhance performance and durability. From advanced adhesion properties to resistance against wear and tear, our formulations are designed to surpass expectations, delivering results that speak for themselves.

settings.heading: Pigment
settings.text: Our paints boast the finest pigments, meticulously selected to deliver breathtaking shades and unmatched vibrancy. Transform your surroundings with Colours that captivate the senses and elevate any space to new heights of beauty.

settings.heading: Resin
settings.text: Formulated with premium resins for lasting quality, our paints are more than just a surface coatingâ€”they're a testament to excellence. With unrivaled coverage and durability, our formulations set the standard for paint perfection, ensuring a flawless finish that stands the test of time.

settings.heading: INGREDIENTS
settings.text: Landlords Paint combines eco-friendly practices with high-quality materials, offering a product that's both kind to the environment and your wallet. Our paints provide a premium look and feel without the added cost of branded value.

settings.title: Surface Preparation
settings.text: The primer effectively prepares the surface by creating a smooth and uniform base, ensuring optimal paint adhesion.

settings.title: Adhesion Enhancement
settings.text: Utilises advanced adhesion technology to enhance the bond between the surface and the subsequent paint layers.

settings.title: Eco-friendly Formulation
settings.text: Crafted with environmentally-friendly ingredients, providing a sustainable solution for your painting needs.

settings.title: Transparent Finish
settings.text: Once dry, the primer leaves a transparent surface, allowing the true colour of the paint to shine through without interference.

settings.title: Efficient Coverage
settings.text: With its excellent coverage properties, the primer allows you to prime a larger area with fewer coats, saving time and effort.

settings.title: Odourless Application
settings.text: Enjoy a hassle-free painting experience with the primer's odourless formula, suitable for use in indoor spaces.

settings.title: Quick Drying
settings.text: Dries quickly to touch within 2 hours, allowing for faster recoating and reducing downtime during the painting process.

settings.title: Versatile Application
settings.text: Suitable for a wide range of surfaces, including walls, ensuring versatility and convenience in your painting projects.
